{{Actor| | type = Light source | name = Light globe | class = LightGlobe | game = Strife | doomednum = 2028 | convid = 209 }}[[Classes]]: LightGlobe
A twined iron stick with a light globe on its top. ==== [[DECORATE]] definition ==== ACTOR LightGlobe { {{Property|Radius}} 16 {{Property|Height}} 16 +{{Flag|SOLID}} States { Spawn: LITE A -1 Bright Stop } }
